attributes.action: appoint Brian Blessed as the Speaker of the House
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Brian Blessed is the only man who can restore the public's faith in politicians. As Speaker he would provide clear leadership and a no-nonsense approach to reforms.
At a time of political crisis, this country needs Brian Blessed.

rejection.details: This is a matter for Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
